data.route_analysis: Direct flights available from major cities; local transport options include buses and shuttles.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best months for visiting are from September to November due to pleasant weather.
data.climate: Climate varies from tropical in the lowlands to temperate in highlands; recommend lightweight clothing and rain gear.
data.culture: Rich cultural heritage with Mayan ruins, colonial architecture, and vibrant festivals.
data.attractions: Must-visit sites include Antigua, Lake Atitlan, and Tikal temples.
